package.description:
Core functionality to get equilibrium point control (EPC) running on a robot. In addition to robot-agnostic code for EPC, this package also implements Python classes for two different robots (the PR2 and Cody).
Controlling a robot using EPC requires you to write a class that implements the same functions.
package.author: Advait Jain, Advisor: Prof. Charlie Kemp. (Healthcare Robotics Lab, Georgia Tech)
